user_description: You are a Masters level student and your thesis is on Cybersecurity.
objective: Your objective is to use this website to find a PhD student to get your thesis reviewed.

memories.next_action: My next immediate action would be to use the search bar to look for PhD students who specialize in the field of Cybersecurity. I would enter keywords such as "cybersecurity", "PhD", "student", or possibly "thesis review" to try and filter relevant results.
My next immediate action would be to use the search bar to input the keywords, such as "Cybersecurity", "PhD students", "thesis review" to filter and find relevant PhD reviewers.

My next immediate action would be to use the search bar provided on the webpage to search for a PhD student specializing in Cybersecurity who can review my thesis. I would enter the previously used keywords "cybersecurity", "PhD", "student", and "thesis review" to streamline the results.
